title: Apple iOS , MacOS Memory Corruption Zero Day Vulnerability
Column1:
2/12 CH - Discuss Vulnerability Alert, QID's Available for iOS/Tahoe (610759, 386542)

Current Condition: CVE-2026-20700 is a critical zero-day vulnerability in Apple's dynamic link editor that affects multiple operating systems, including iOS and macOS, and has been utilized in targeted, sophisticated attacks.

Actions: Issued Vulnerability alert

Needs: Version Enforcement/Patching
